reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A nice gentle detergent for your precious natural fibers
reviews.reviewText: I bought this product after searching for something to revive my cashmere and woolens after long winters of intensive use here in Minnesota. I chose the lavender scent to keep any unseemly stinks from lurking in the corners of my sweaters, and it imparts a very pleasant and close-to-skin lavender scent that is not too overpowering. While the lavender is nice, I also ordered some cedar oil to add to the wash to keep clothes moths at bay. In fact, my only suggestion for this product would be to offer a cedar oil/scent version of this product because us natural fiber girlies know that clothes moths are no joke. Aside from that suggestion, I am very pleased with this product and chose to view the price as an investment in the long-term viability of my nice sweaters (although of course who wouldn't love to see it cost a little less?).I also threw this detergent straight into the deep end in order to *gasp* wash a leather jacket that I picked up secondhand in Spain that dearly needed a cleaning (the cost of this detergent is small compared to dry cleaning/leather professionals). It didn't ruin the leather and the lavender smell helped mask the dusty smell emanating from years of baking in the Spanish sun, no doubt. Actually, if anything, it was almost TOO gentle for the kind of clean this jacket needed. It is almost fully dry and I am about to foist an absolute army of leather products upon this jacket. I will include pictures for the curious if the jacket rehab does not turn out to be a complete disaster.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle & Smells Great
reviews.reviewText: Great wash for my wools. I had some Merino wool blankets that were gifted to me cleaned at our local laundromat and they came back smelling like my sister's dogs. I washed them with this and was pleasantly surprised how soft they came out and they no longer smelled like a kennel. I've used it on sweaters with the same positive results. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use it to wash my silk nightgown, I have sensitive skin and as of now the soap has been working well. My silk pajama's are in good condition and my skin is not itching.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Gentle, Sustainable, and Eco Friendly Wool & Silk Detergent
reviews.reviewText: This detergent not only comes from a fantastic company doing wonderful things with their sustainable and eco minded products, but the detergent works really well and is super gentle on wools/silks. I hand knit many sweaters and this always washes them well and without damage to the delicate fibers. Super gentle on the skin, I've never had any sort of irritation with it. Love it and can't recommend it highly enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Expensive but Excellent
reviews.reviewText: I've used this on silk curtains and pants, wool fabric, and also on some old stuffed animals. Cleans well, the smell is oily but very mild, a and it rinsed out thoroughly. Very good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked to clean my silk items!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to handwash silk scarves, sari, and wool clothes, and I'm very happy with the results. It cleans really well, everything came out fresh, and nothing got weird in the wash. No issues with the fabric or color fastness! Great product that works as advertised!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for silks

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wool and Wool Blends
reviews.reviewText: Noticeable difference the first time my wool clothing was washed with Sonett Organic Olive Liquid Soap! They are softer, with a pleasant appearance. Four points as I did not realize a Sonett Rinse was to follow the wash. Would recommend this fine product! Thank you.
